tool_description: Compile Generate Graphs/Code Snippets and more with support upto 70+ languages.
name: Code Runner
title: Code Runner

api_list.name: creditLimit
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://code-runner.p.rapidapi.com/credit_limit"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "code-runner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
